page.title: 15HOLIDAYS IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: We questioned 100 people about holidays. We found that 37% always go on holiday, 58% sometimes go and 5% don't go. We found from the survey that{Blackpool}was the most popular destination and{Spain}was the second most popular. According to the survey only 34% go abroad on holiday but 93% would like to go abroad if they could afford it. 85% go on holiday once per year, 10% go twice, 3% go 3 times, 1% go 5 times and a lucky 1% go 6 times. 47% prefer a lively holiday and 53% prefer a quiet holiday. The survey showed that 32% go to the same place every year. 4% had won a holiday in a competition. The most popular holiday place, if they could afford it, is {America}and second most popular place, if they could afford it, is{Hawaii.
